name: Correspondence
description: Understanding of the connections between places, spaces, and things.

name: Entropy
description: Study of mortality, probability, and chaos.

name: Life
description: Influence over organic beings and the physical structures of living bodies.

name: Matter
description: Control of inert materials, objects, and solid elemental structures.

name: Mind
description: Influence over emotions and thoughts, including the ability to project consciousness from one's physical body.

name: Spirit
description: Contact with Otherworldly spaces and entities; considered an Art by mystics and a Science by Technocrats, though in game terms it's all the same thing.

name: Time
description: Perception of, and influence over, temporal states and time-based phenomena.

name: Data
description: The manipulation of information and its connections.

name: Dimensional Science
description: The manipulation of alternate dimensions and their properties.

name: Primal Utility
description: The manipulation of quantum valuation energies.
